description: We provide a wide selection of  luxury as well as budgeted villas in Karjat for rent. Karjat, a mini hill station is a perfect getaway from the daily chaotic routine. Based along the Konkan coast, Karjat holds a very fascinating location, in the Raigad District of Maharashtra. It proffers varied activities like river rafting, trekking, hiking and mountain climbing for all you adventurers.
name: Karjat
